June 4, 2020

https://www.dailyrecord.co.uk/news/politics/snp-government-quizzed-sick-pay-22137348

However, some care staff have been nervous about taking a test in case it plunges them into poverty.

Many of the workers are employed by private companies and would only be entitled to £95 a week statutory sick pay if they fell ill.

The idea the SNP is having a &#39;good pandemic&#39; is preposterous

June 4, 2020

https://capx.co/the-idea-the-snp-is-having-a-good-pandemic-is-preposterous/

A recent poll by Ipsos MORI on behalf of BBC Scotland found that 82% of Scots think Sturgeon has handled the crisis “fairly well” or “very well”. Despite the £3.7 billion in extra funding from the UK Government to help Scotland weather the pandemic, only 49% of Scots think the UK Government has handled the crisis well.

Yet claims that Sturgeon is having a “good pandemic” are as inaccurate as they are inappropriate. According to the former Head of Analysis for the ONS, Scotland’s coronavirus death rate is one of the worst in the world.
